title: How to Make Yogurt Cake

steps.headline: Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C).
Combine cake mix, 3/4 cup of water, 1/3 cup of vegetable oil, 3 egg whites, and 6 ounces of yogurt.
Mix together with hand mixer on medium speed for two minutes.
Lightly grease 9 x 13 inch pan with cooking spray.
Use a spatula to spread cake mix evenly into greased 9 x 13 inch pan.
Place pan in oven on the middle rack.
Bake cake mix for 25-30 minutes.
Wait until cake is cool to the touch to mix and add topping.
Combine 3/4 of a tub of light whipped cream and 6 ounces of yogurt in a mixing bowl.
Use spatula to spread topping evenly on cake.
Finished.
Preheat the oven to 350ºF/180ºC.
steps.description: Grease the pan with butter. Then dust it with flour. Or line with parchment paper.

steps.headline: Cream the butter and sugar together in a large mixing bowl.
Add the essence of choice.
Beat in the eggs.
Add the flour and mix well.
Add the yogurt.
Pour the cake batter into the baking pan.
Bake for an hour.
Test for readiness.
steps.description: Insert a toothpick. If it comes out clean then your cake is ready.

steps.headline: Remove from the oven.
steps.description: Allow to cool for 5 minutes in the pan. Then remove and allow to cool on a wire cooling rack.

text: Cake Mix Yogurt Cake Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Combine cake mix, 3/4 cup of water, 1/3 cup of vegetable oil, 3 egg whites, and 6 ounces of yogurt.  Mix together with hand mixer on medium speed for two minutes. Batter will remain slightly lumpy. Lightly grease 9 x 13 inch pan with cooking spray.  Use a spatula to spread cake mix evenly into greased 9 x 13 inch pan.  Place pan in oven on the middle rack.  Bake cake mix for 25-30 minutes.  Wait until cake is cool to the touch to mix and add topping.  Combine 3/4 of a tub of light whipped cream and 6 ounces of yogurt in a mixing bowl. Mix together with a spatula. Use spatula to spread topping evenly on cake.  Finished.  Yogurt Cake from Scratch Preheat the oven to 350ºF/180ºC. Grease the pan with butter. Then dust it with flour. Or line with parchment paper. Cream the butter and sugar together in a large mixing bowl.  Add the essence of choice. Stir in. Beat in the eggs. Stir it together. Add the flour and mix well.  Add the yogurt. Stir in. Pour the cake batter into the baking pan.  Bake for an hour.  Test for readiness. Insert a toothpick. If it comes out clean then your cake is ready. Remove from the oven. Allow to cool for 5 minutes in the pan. Then remove and allow to cool on a wire cooling rack.
